name: OctopusAwaitTask
description: Await the completion of a execution task
author: Octopus Deploy

inputs.name: Space
inputs.label: Space
inputs.helpMarkDown: The space within Octopus. This must be the name of the space, not the id.

inputs.name: Step
inputs.label: Step
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the step that queued the deployment/runbook run. You will need to set a output variable reference name on the source step and use that name here.

inputs.name: PollingInterval
inputs.label: Polling Interval
inputs.helpMarkDown: How frequently, in seconds, to check the status. (Default: 10s)

inputs.name: TimeoutAfter
inputs.label: Timeout After
inputs.helpMarkDown: Duration, in seconds, to allow for completion before timing out. (Default: 600s)

inputs.name: ShowProgress
inputs.label: Show Progress
inputs.helpMarkDown: Log Octopus task outputs to Azure DevOps output. (Default: false)

inputs.name: CancelOnTimeout
inputs.label: Cancel Task on Timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: Cancel the Octopus task and mark this task as failed if the timeout is reached. (Default: false)

outputVariables.name: completed_successfully
outputVariables.description: Whether the task(s) completed successfully or not. This will only be true if all tasks succeeded, and false if any tasks failed.

outputVariables.name: server_task_results
outputVariables.description: JSON representation of all tasks results. { "serverTaskId": <task id>, "tenantName": <tenant name>, "environmentName": <environment name>, "successful": <true | false> }
